alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Northern Humboldt Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 21 at 10:21PM PST until February 23 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON BELOW 1000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, small hail and snow. Snow accumulations up one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch below 1000 feet, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches possible. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte and Northern Humboldt Coast Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 PM PST Wednesday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Northern Humboldt Coast
